files: TRADEOS_TEAM.lds.json - Employee directory, certifications, training, time-off, payroll
TRADEOS_INVENTORY.lds.json - Parts catalog, truck stock, purchase orders, suppliers
TRADEOS_REMODELER.lds.json - Project phases, change orders, photos, selections, draws, punch list
key_features_delivered: Employee directory with profile cards and detail view
Role-based employee display (admin, office, field_tech)
Skills and certifications tracking with expiration alerts
Training management: completed, scheduled, required
Time-off request workflow with approve/deny
PTO and sick balance tracking
Payroll summary with hourly rates and monthly estimates
Performance metrics for field techs (jobs, rating)
Parts catalog with SKU, cost, sell price
Warehouse stock levels with low stock alerts
Truck inventory per technician with min quantities
Purchase order creation, submission, approval workflow
PO receiving with automatic inventory update
Supplier management with terms and lead times
Remodeler project overview with progress tracking
Phase management with completion percentage
Change order creation and approval workflow
Photo timeline with phase tagging
Customer selections tracking (pending, selected, ordered, installed)
Draw schedule tied to project milestones
Punch list management with priority and assignments
Subcontractor tracking by trade and phase

next_step.description: Create TRADEOS_ASSEMBLER.lds.json to combine all entities into single deployable React application
next_step.output: index.html with embedded React + all components
